Essentia

Overview

Essentia is a system of scripts to controll essentia flow in essentia tubes from Thaumcraft

Controller

Functions

class Essentia.Controller
static log(head, str)

Logging with title and time

Parameters

  • head (Title) – of log message

  • str (Log) – message

static getLocalID(aspect)

Convert aspect name to local ID

Parameters

aspect (Aspect) – name to convert

Returns

ID of the aspct or 0 when aspect is not served

Return type

Local

static sendResponse(s, head, status, contents)

Send a response to a request

Parameters

  • s (Adress) – of requesting client

  • head (Header) – of the response packet

  • status (Status) – of the response packet

  • contents (Table) – with packet contents

static sendPulse(id)

Sends a redstone pulse to a bundled cable on the output side on the specified channel

Parameters

id (Local) – ID which corresponds to the color channel of the bundled cable
